com.palomamobile.android.sdk.core.util

Class SimpleGsonPrefsCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palomamobile.android.sdk.core.util.SimpleGsonPrefsCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICache

    public class SimpleGsonPrefsCache
extends Object
implements ICache
    Simple, not very scalable, implementation of ICache interface. It can be used directly by invoking the put(String, Object) It also listens to the event bus ServiceSupport.getEventBus() and caches values from events that implement ICacheable. Note: cache uses the highest receiver priority so that when another subscriber (unless it also listens with the highest priority) receives an event it can expect the cache to already contain correct values as contained in the event. Cache uses Gson as serialization mechanism and SharedPreferences for storage, in terms of performance this is fine for caching tokens and other small bits and bobs but likely not much more than that.
